member.name: D2D1_SVG_LINE_CAP
member.summary: Specifies a value for the SVG stroke-linecap property.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_LINE_CAP.D2D1_SVG_LINE_CAP_BUTT
member.summary: The property is set to SVG's 'butt' value.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_LINE_CAP.D2D1_SVG_LINE_CAP_SQUARE
member.summary: The property is set to SVG's 'square' value.

member.name: D2D1_SVG_LINE_CAP.D2D1_SVG_LINE_CAP_ROUND
member.summary: The property is set to SVG's 'round' value.
